1.title: Pushed to the Edge

episode of.title: Bad Girls All Star Battle (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Ray J welcomes 16 of the toughest Bad Girls to Season 2. The ladies will once again compete for $100,000 and the title of Baddest Bad Girl, but first all 16 girls will battle to become one of the two team captains and choose teams for the season.

2.title: Bad Girl Breakout

episode of.title: Bad Girls All Star Battle (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: In the Captain's Challenge, the Bad Girls show off their skills of getting paid, and making it stick. A secret cross-team alliance forms between Camilla and Elease, as the competition causes someone to abruptly leave the house.

3.title: What a Tangled Web

episode of.title: Bad Girls All Star Battle (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: The Bad Girls' mental power is tested in the "Brain Games" Captain's Challenge, building tension amongst the two teams as alliances are tested. One of the toughest Bad Girls injures herself in the Team Challenge, jeopardizing her chance at $100,000.

4.title: Unbeweavable

episode of.title: Bad Girls All Star Battle (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Rocky's injury intensifies leaving her fearful that she may be easy prey for opportunistic competitors. In the most physically tough Team Challenge yet, two girls are taken away in an ambulance, causing a big twist in the competition.

5.title: Sometimes You Have to Play Dirty

episode of.title: Bad Girls All Star Battle (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Things get sexy in the Captain's Challenge when the girls get up close and personal with male partners. In the Team Challenge, a rough game of flag football separates the floaters from the game's toughest competitors.

6.title: All Hail the Queen

episode of.title: Bad Girls All Star Battle (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: A shakeup in the game causes the remaining 10 Bad Girls to scramble in order to regain their place in the competition. With a double elimination on the horizon, the girls have to scheme and backstab in an effort to maintain their alliances.

7.title: Twerk It Out

episode of.title: Bad Girls All Star Battle (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: The girls fight for dominance and dollars in an explosive battle challenge the likes of which no bad girl has ever seen. Team Alliances remain steadfast as new power players rise to the top, sending the weaker girls packing.

8.title: Nobody Eats for Free

episode of.title: Bad Girls All Star Battle (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: The all-stars are pushed to the brink when the battle challenge turns out to be their worst nightmare. Those with the guts to compete are separated from those that are simply sliding by.

9.title: The Battle Dome

episode of.title: Bad Girls All Star Battle (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Bones and egos are bruised in the Bad Girls Battle Dome as tensions flare in the toughest competition yet, as the six remaining girls vie for their spot in the finale. Who will make it to the end and who will be left behind?

10.title: Winner Take All

episode of.title: Bad Girls All Star Battle (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: Alliances are shattered as the final four sprint into the season finale. It all comes down to this - only one competitor will capture the $100,000 and be crowned "The Baddest Bad Girl" of them all.

11.title: Reunion - Part 1

episode of.title: Bad Girls All Star Battle (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: Tanisha welcomes the cast as they come back together. Old teammates shake things up as Camilla voices her frustration over Elease's two-faced actions and Rocky rocks the boat with her former friends to test where their loyalty stands.

12.title: Reunion - Part 2

episode of.title: Bad Girls All Star Battle (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: In part two of the reunion hosted by Tanisha Thomas, Nancy and Camilla reminisce over their steamy relationship, Paula pops off over Stephanie and Valentina's betrayal, and Sarah and Shelly bring the battle to the stage, confronting Alicia on starting things she can't finish.

1.title: Keep Your Friends Close and Your Enemies Closer

episode of.title: Bad Girls All Star Battle (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: TV star and musician, Ray J, welcomes 14 Bad Girl All Stars to form teams and square off in their first of many weekly challenges. Will the girls be able to put their differences aside in order to win $100,000 and the title of "Baddest Bad Girl?"

2.title: A Snake in a Maze

episode of.title: Bad Girls All Star Battle (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Feelings of distrust arise amongst the Bad Girls after Natalie and Mehgan's blowup at the last elimination. Each team's strategy is put to the test when they must navigate through a maze while handcuffed and blindfolded for the main challenge.

3.title: Secrets and Lies

episode of.title: Bad Girls All Star Battle (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Early alliances are compromised between Natalie, Flo and Amber while this week's Captain and Team Challenges involve squealing pigs and Velcro. Bitter truths are revealed causing friendships to shatter and teams to lose their unity.

4.title: Hang Tough

episode of.title: Bad Girls All Star Battle (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: The girls discover who has the strength to hang on and win it all during a Captains Challenge of new heights. The succeeding Team Challenge warns them all that they need to literally and figuratively watch their backs in order to win the battle.

5.title: Pink and Purple Make Camo!

episode of.title: Bad Girls All Star Battle (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: The Pink and Purple teams merge, leaving the remaining eight girls scrambling to form new alliances. While Natalie and Jenn secretly plot against the Twins, one player's injury may cost her the game.

6.title: Breakfast in Bed

episode of.title: Bad Girls All Star Battle (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: The women compete in a challenge based on Bad Girls Club history; one player's blindside turns the tide of the game.

7.title: The Ultimate Cat Fight

episode of.title: Bad Girls All Star Battle (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: The claws come out when the girls faceoff in a gladiator-style slug-fest. Tension is higher than ever as the five remaining all-stars battle for a slot in the finale and $100,000.

8.title: Good Things Come to Those Who Wait

episode of.title: Bad Girls All Star Battle (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: In the finale, the four remaining girls face off in the final challenges and one player reacts badly when a surprise elimination takes them out before they can finish the game. One girl reigns to become "Baddest Bad Girl" and chance to take home $100,000.

9.title: Reunion Part 1

episode of.title: Bad Girls All Star Battle (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Hosted by Tanisha Thomas, the 14 All Stars reunite in LA to rehash the season's drama and answer viewers' most burning questions. In addition, the series' host, Ray J, breaks down all the backstage drama with one-on-one interviews and exclusive behind-the-scenes footage.

10.title: Reunion Part 2

episode of.title: Bad Girls All Star Battle (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: Hosted by Tanisha Thomas, the 14 All Stars reunite in LA to rehash the season's drama and answer viewers' most burning questions. In addition, the series' host, Ray J, breaks down all the backstage drama with one-on-one interviews and exclusive behind-the-scenes footage.

11.title: Twinstant Replay

episode of.title: Bad Girls All Star Battle (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: The outrageous Victor twins host a recap of the greatest moments from Bad Girls All Star Battle.

imdb.title: Bad Girls All Star Battle
akas: Bad Girls All Star Battle (United States)
plot: Sixteen of the baddest Bad Girls return to compete against each other for a chance to win 100,000 dollars.
